name: Widget Code Generator
description:
The Widget Code Generator plugin for Figma design allows you to design widgets and easily translate your designs into code. This Figma plugin generates code that you can copy and use to create a widget interface.


In order to add interactivity to your widget, you’ll need to edit the generated code to handle user events. Learn more in the widget API documentation.


Learn more about how to use the Widget Code Generator in the Help Center.


---

The Widget Code Generator plugin is licensed under Figma’s Terms of Service, unless you have a different agreement with us for Figma Services.
